author: wn.com
title: Nau Civil War Center Explores Ongoing Influence of America’s Defining Conflict (University of Virginia)
text: ( Source : University of Virginia ) In the pantheon of American events that charted the course of the nation, almost nothing comes close to the Civil War . Maybe nothing at all. The war was all things at once: Horrific. Historic. Gripping.
